relevant_findings.neurologic: Confused and minimally conversant, slow responses, oriented to person only.
relevant_findings.skin: Tight skin around the mouth and fingers, ash-colored, painful, and cool fingers.

relevant_findings.neurologic: Slow to respond but provided clear answers.
relevant_findings.musculoskeletal: Marked thickening and puckering of the skin around the mouth, muscle wasting in the neck, motor strength in hip flexors less than 3 out of 5 bilaterally; unable to lift legs off bed.
relevant_findings.lung: Fine crackles at lung bases bilaterally.
relevant_findings.skin: Telangiectasias over face and upper chest.
